keyword: how many calories in potato salad
title: How Many Calories in Potato Salad?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in potato salad per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, and nutrition breakdowns for easy meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in Potato Salad?
assumptions: Homemade potato salad with boiled potatoes, mayonnaise dressing, celery, onion, and mustard; about 150 g per cup serving; no added eggs or bacon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, ingredients, portion size, and preparation method. Check labels for store-bought versions.

quick_answer.text: One cup of potato salad contains about 225 calories, with high carbs from potatoes and fat from mayo.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add chopped celery and reduce mayo by half

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of potato salad?
faqs.a: Approximately 225 calories for a standard homemade serving.

faqs.q: Is potato salad high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 21 g carbs per cup, mostly from potatoes.

faqs.q: How much fat is in potato salad?
faqs.a: Around 15 g total fat per cup, primarily from mayonnaise.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in potato salad?
faqs.a: About 450 mg per cup, varying with added salt or dressing.

faqs.q: Can I make potato salad lower in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, substitute Greek yogurt for mayo or add more veggies to cut calories by 20-30%.
